fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced row-level column reference [DepartmentName] with 'Attendance+ (HR_Attendance_Dataset)'[DepartmentName] and converted the Tableau parameter reference [Parameters].[Select Departmrnt] to SELECTEDVALUE('Select Departmrnt'[Display As]).
